name: De-Genius Casino
description: What is the project about? De-Genius Casino is a gambling project that aims to be an all in one stop shop for your entertainment needs. With a telegram gamble bot and lottery dapp offering different methods of engagement. The bot will be available to the public for use and new offerings will be made available including high stakes 1vs1. De-genius casino offers a fun and exciting way to gamble right from your pocket. What makes your project unique? The project is unique by allowing any group to utilize our bot using ETH to purchase casino tokens. This increases engagement and usage around the crypto world without being limited to our project. Holders of the native token are rewarded directly through revenue sharing based on the supply they hold. So the more people engage the bot, the more the holders will be rewarded. History of your project. Held a small private sale of 2.5E. The token launched on Ethereum on August 9, 2023. Whatâ€™s next for your project? The project will be releasing additional games to add to the collection as well as developing the tg lottery bot which will enable holders to engage the lottery platform directly from telegram. High stakes PVP tournaments and AMAs. What can your token be used for? DEGEN tokens can be used to purchase lottery tickets. The token also represents your holdings for revenue share. Holding a greater amount of DEGEN tokens means more rewards in your pocket, just by holding.
